text: Albert Tubilandu Ndimbi (15 March 1948 â€“ 17 June 2021) was a Congolese football goalkeeper. He played for Zaire in the 1974 FIFA World Cup. He also played for AS Vita Club. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo footballers
title: Tubilandu Ndimbi
